forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 52. Northwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
As the night lingers over Downtown San Francisco, the city rests beneath a clear, star-speckled sky, with only the soft hum of the northwest winds whispering through the quiet streets. The current chill, wrapping around the 52-degree mark, carries the promise of a sunny Sunday on the horizon. Gentle gusts, reaching up to 32 mph, add a brisk touch to the air, reminding us of the coastal influence that keeps the city’s often moody weather so mercurial.

The dawn will break with a warm embrace, ushering in a day where the temperature rises to a gracious 68 degrees before gently sliding towards a cooler 63 in the afternoon. The sunlight will chase away any lingering shadows, while the winds will remain a constant companion, bringing both refreshing movement and a slight chill as they dance across the expanse of the Golden Gate. This serene day calls for comfort in layers—perhaps a light sweater over a short-sleeved shirt, perfect for strolling through the lively streets or exploring the colorful neighborhoods. The crispness of the day invites you to savor a leisurely walk along the waterfront or sip a warm brew at a corner café, indulging in the simple pleasure of watching the world wake up around you as life pulses gently through the city’s veins.
